meanings.sent1: I love using reusables containers for my lunch.
meanings.sent2: It is important to choose reusables products to help the environment.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that my reusables water bottle is like a magic cup that never runs out.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and reusables as a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The concept of reusables materials is like a never-ending cycle of usefulness.

meanings.definition: Items that can be used multiple times without being thrown away.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my reusables with me when I go shopping.
meanings.sent2: The store promotes the use of reusables bags instead of plastic ones.
meanings.sent3: The reusables in the kitchen seem to have a secret life of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a collection of reusables ideas waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The impact of reusables on reducing waste is undeniable.
